# MiCake Documentation

> MiCake is a lightweight Domain-Driven Design (DDD) toolkit for .NET developers.

This documentation site provides comprehensive guides for using MiCake framework.

## API for Raw Markdown Content

AI systems can access raw markdown content via the following endpoints:

- **Manifest**: `/api/raw-markdown/manifest` - Get list of all available documents with metadata
- **Document**: `/api/raw-markdown/{path}` - Get raw markdown content as JSON

## Documentation Structure

### Getting Started
- [Introduction](/getting-started/introduction) - Overview of MiCake framework
- [Quick Start](/getting-started/quick-start) - Get started in 5 minutes
- [Core Concepts](/getting-started/core-concepts) - Understand the fundamental concepts

### Domain-Driven Design
- [Entity](/domain-driven/entity) - Learn about entities in DDD
- [Value Object](/domain-driven/value-object) - Immutable value objects
- [Aggregate Root](/domain-driven/aggregate-root) - Aggregate roots and boundaries
- [Repository](/domain-driven/repository) - Repository pattern implementation
- [Domain Event](/domain-driven/domain-event) - Domain events and handlers
- [Domain Service](/domain-driven/domain-service) - Domain services
- [Unit of Work](/domain-driven/unit-of-work) - Transaction management

### Modularity
- [Module Usage](/modularity/module-usage) - Modular architecture

### Features
- [Dependency Injection](/dependency-injection) - DI container integration
- [Exception Handling](/exception) - Exception handling patterns
- [Unified Response](/unified-response/overview) - Standardized API responses
- [API Logging](/api-logging/api-log-usage) - Request/response logging
- [Audit](/audit) - Automatic auditing
- [Soft Delete](/soft-delete) - Soft delete support

### Utilities
- [Overview](/utilities/overview) - Utility libraries
- [BoundedLruCache](/utilities/cache/bounded-lru-cache) - LRU cache implementation
- [Converter](/utilities/converter) - Type conversion utilities
- [Query](/utilities/query) - Dynamic query building
- [Resilience](/utilities/resilience) - Circuit breaker pattern
- [Storage](/utilities/storage) - Data storage pool

## Repository

- GitHub: https://github.com/MiCake/MiCake
- Documentation Source: https://github.com/MiCake/micake.github.io
